title: PII Leak via /███████
content:
Summary:
The ██████████ website allows access to PII of all site users via faulty access control to the /██████ endpoint.
Step-by-step Reproduction Instructions
Browse to ████████ and login or create an account.
Browse to ███████/████████. You will be able to access PII of all site users (click a username to view the PII).
Suggested Mitigation/Remediation Actions
Restrict access to the /██████████ module to only administrative users.
Impact
An adversary can gain access to PII of all ███████ users.
steps: Browse to the target website and login or create an account.
Browse to the vulnerable endpoint (e.g., /███████) to access PII of all site users.
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows unauthorized access to Personally Identifiable Information (PII) of all users on the website due to faulty access control on a specific endpoint. An attacker can view sensitive user data without proper authentication or authorization.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it involves accessing a single endpoint without any complex interactions or state manipulations. The attack does not require multiple components or novel logic, making it easy to identify.
